text:
Hauterivian
Type: Stratigraphic Point
Label: Stratotype Point Base of Hauterivian
See Also: http://cretaceous.stratigraphy.org/gssps...
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/index.h...
Boundary Level: base of bed number 189
Correlation Event: The FO of the ammonite genus Acanthodiscus and the top of Chron M10Nn.3n coincides with the base of the Hauterivian.
Ratified GSSP: true
Status: Ratified 2019
Shape: Base Hauterivian-location

Priabonian
Type: Stratigraphic Point
Label: Stratotype Point Base of Priabonian
Comment: Alano section, Piave River; Veneto Prealps, Belluno province, N. Italy
See Also: https://stratigraphy.org/gssps/#paleogene
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/index.h...
Source: Episodes 2020 October
Boundary Level: Tiziano Bed
Boundary Level: The base of a prominent crystal tuff layer, the Tiziano bed, at meter 63.57
Correlation Event: Calcareous nannofossil near FAD Chiasmolithus oamaruensis (Base of Zone NP18)
Correlation Event: Extinction of large acarininids and Morozovelloides crassatus; the Base of common and continuous Cribrocentrum erbae and the Top of Chiasmolithus grandis; the Base of Chron C17n and Subchron C17n.2n
Ratified GSSP: true
Status: Ratified 2020
Shape: Base Priabonian-location

Meghalayan
Type: Stratigraphic Point
Label: Stratotype Point Base of Meghalayan
Comment: Mawmluh Cave, Meghalaya,India
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/index.h...
See Also: https://timescalefoundation.org/gssp/
See Also: https://doi.org/10.18814/epiiugs/2018/01...
Source: Episodes 41/4, 213-223, 2018
Boundary Level: Mawmluh Cave speleothem dated at 4250yr bk2 (before AD2000)
Correlation Event: Stable isotope profile shows a shift to heavier isotopic values
Ratified GSSP: true
Status: Ratified 2018
Shape: Base Meghalayan-location

Aeronian
Type: Stratigraphic Point
Label: Stratotype Point Base of Aeronian
Comment: Trefawr Track Section, Wales, UK
See Also: http://stratigraphy.science.purdue.edu/r...
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/Rhu-Tel...
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/index.h...
Source: Episodes 8/2, p. 101 103, 1985
Source: Geol. Series, Nat. Mus. Wales, 9, p. 36 50, 1989
Boundary Level: within Trefawar Formation
Correlation Event: Graptolite FAD Monograptus austerus Sequens
Ratified GSSP: true
Status: Ratified 1984
Shape: Base Aeronian-location

Bajocian
Type: Stratigraphic Point
Label: Stratotype Point Base of Bajocian
Comment: Murtinheira Section, Cabo Mondego, Portugal
See Also: http://stratigraphy.science.purdue.edu/r...
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/index.h...
Source: Episodes 20/1, p.16 22, 1997
Boundary Level: Base of Bed AB 11
Correlation Event: Ammonite FAD Hyperlioceras mundum, Hyperlioceras furcatum, Braunsina aeraSP, and Braunsina elegantula
Ratified GSSP: true
Status: Ratified 1996
Shape: Base Bajocian-location

Bathonian
Type: Stratigraphic Point
Label: Stratotype Point Base of Bathonian
Comment: Ravin du Bes, Bas Auran area, Alpes de Haute Provence, France
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/Bajocia...
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/Bathoni...
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/index.h...
Boundary Level: Base of limestone bed RB07
Correlation Event: Ammonite FAD Gonolkite convergens (defines Base of Zigzagiceras zigzag Zone)
Ratified GSSP: true
Status: Ratified 2008
Shape: Base Bathonian-location

Calabrian
Type: Stratigraphic Point
Label: Stratotype Point Base of Calabrian
Comment: Vrica, Italy
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/Calabri...
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/Calabri...
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/index.h...
Source: Episodes 35/3, p. 388-397, 2012
Source: Episodes 8/2, p. 116 120, 1985
Boundary Level: Base of the marine claystone overlying the sapropelic marker Bed e (Mediterranean Precession Related Sapropel, MPRS 176)
Correlation Event: Magnetic 15 kyr after end of Olduvai (C2n) ; normal polarity chron
Ratified GSSP: true
Status: Ratified 1985 as Base of Pleistocene; Ratified 2011 as Base of Calabrian
Shape: Base Calabrian-location

Capitanian
Type: Stratigraphic Point
Label: Stratotype Point Base of Capitanian
Comment: Nipple Hill, SE Guadalupe Mountains, Texas, U.S.A
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/index.h...
Boundary Level: 4.5m above the Base of the outcrop section of the Pinery Limestone Member of the Bell Canyon Formation
Correlation Event: Conodont FAD Jinogondolella postserrata |
Ratified GSSP: true
Status: Ratified 2001
Shape: Base Capitanian-location

Carboniferous
Type: Stratigraphic Point
Label: Stratotype Point Base of Carboniferous
Comment: La Serre, France
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/Tournai...
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/index.h...
Source: Newsletters on Stratigraphy, 43/2, p. 195 205, 2009
Source: Episodes 14/4, p. 331 336, 1991
Boundary Level: Base of Bed 89 in Trench E’ at La Serre, (but FAD now known to be at Base of Bed 85)
Correlation Event: Conodont FAD Siphonodella sulcata IMPRECISE (Stratotype Point discovered in 2006 to have biostratigraphic problems, and can not be correlated with precision.)
Ratified GSSP: true
Status: Ratified 1990
Shape: Base Carboniferous-location

Cenozoic
Type: Stratigraphic Point
Label: Stratotype Point Base of Cenozoic
Comment: Oued Djerfane, west of El Kef, Tunisia
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/Danian....
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/index.h...
Source: Episodes 29/4, p. 263 278, 2006
Boundary Level: reddish layer at the Base of the 50cm thick, dark boundary clay
Correlation Event: Iridium geochemical anomaly. Associated with a major extinction horizon (dinosaurs, ammonites, foraminifers, etc.)
Ratified GSSP: true
Status: Ratified 1991
Shape: Base Cenozoic-location

Changhsingian
Type: Stratigraphic Point
Label: Stratotype Point Base of Changhsingian
Comment: Meishan, Zhejiang Province, China
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/Changhs...
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/index.h...
Source: Episodes 29/3, p. 175 182, 2006
Boundary Level: Base of Bed 4a 2, 88 cm above the Base of the Changxing Limestone at the Meishan D Section
Correlation Event: Conodont FAD Clarkina wangi
Ratified GSSP: true
Status: Ratified 2005
Shape: Base Changhsingian-location

Darriwilian
Type: Stratigraphic Point
Label: Stratotype Point Base of Darriwilian
Comment: Huangnitang section, Changshan, Zhejiang Province, SE China
See Also: http://stratigraphy.science.purdue.edu/r...
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/Darriwi...
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/index.h...
Source: Episodes 20/3, p. 158 166, 1997
Boundary Level: Base of Bed AEP 184
Correlation Event: Graptolite FAD Undulograptus austrodentatus
Ratified GSSP: true
Status: Ratified 1987
Shape: Base Darriwilian-location

Devonian
Type: Stratigraphic Point
Label: Stratotype Point Base of Devonian
Comment: Klonk, near Prague, Czech Republic
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/index.h...
Source: IUGS Series A, 5, p. 96 109, 1977
Boundary Level: within Bed 20
Correlation Event: Graptolite FAD Monograptus uniformis
Ratified GSSP: true
Status: Ratified 1972
Shape: Base Devonian-location

Drumian
Type: Stratigraphic Point
Label: Stratotype Point Base of Drumian
Comment: Drum Mountains, Millard County, Utah, USA
See Also: http://stratigraphy.science.purdue.edu/r...
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/Drumian...
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/index.h...
Source: Episodes 30/2,p. 85 95, 2007
Boundary Level: at the Base of a dark gray thinly laminated calcisiltite layer, 62 m above the Base of the Wheeler Formation
Correlation Event: Trilobite FAD Ptychagnostus atavus
Ratified GSSP: true
Status: Ratified 2006
Shape: Base Drumian-location

Ediacaran
Type: Stratigraphic Point
Label: Stratotype Point Base of Ediacaran
Comment: Enorama Creek, Flinders Ranges, South Australia
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/Ediacar...
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/index.h...
See Also: http://stratigraphy.science.purdue.edu/r...
Source: Lethaia 39, p.13 30, 2006
Boundary Level: Base of the Marinoan cap Carbonate
Correlation Event: (1) ; rapid decay of Marinoan ice sheets and onset of distinct cap carbonates throughout the world, and (2) ; the beginning of a distinctive pattern of secular changes in carbon isotopes.
Ratified GSSP: true
Status: Ratified 1990
Shape: Base Ediacaran-location

Emsian
Type: Stratigraphic Point
Label: Stratotype Point Base of Emsian
Comment: Zinzil'ban Gorge in the Kitab State Geological Reserve, Uzbekistan
See Also: http://stratigraphy.science.purdue.edu/r...
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/Emsian....
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/index.h...
Source: Episodes 20/4, p. 235 240, 1997
Boundary Level: Base of Bed 9/5
Correlation Event: Conodont FAD Polygnathus kitabicus
Ratified GSSP: true
Status: Ratified 1995
Shape: Base Emsian-location

Eocene
Type: Stratigraphic Point
Label: Stratotype Point Base of Eocene
Comment: Dababiya, near Luxor, Egypt
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/Ypresia...
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/index.h...
Source: Episodes 30/4, p. 271 286, 2007
Source: Micropaleontology 49/1, p.41 59, 2003
Boundary Level: Base of Bed 1 in DBH subsection
Correlation Event: Carbon Isotope Excursion base, initiation of basal Eocene Thermal maximum (PETM)
Ratified GSSP: true
Status: Ratified 2003
Shape: Base Eocene-location

Famennian
Type: Stratigraphic Point
Label: Stratotype Point Base of Famennian
Comment: Coumiac Quarry, near Cessenon, Montagne Noire, France
See Also: http://stratigraphy.science.purdue.edu/r...
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/Famenni...
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/index.h...
Source: Episodes 16/4, p. 433 441, 1993
Boundary Level: Base of Bed 32a
Correlation Event: Conodont FAD Palmatolepis triangularis, just above a major extinction horizon (Kellwasser Event) ; with conodont LADs Ancyrodella and Ozarkodina, and Goniatite LADs of Gephuroceratidae and Beloceratidae
Ratified GSSP: true
Status: Ratified 1993
Shape: Base Famennian-location

Floian
Type: Stratigraphic Point
Label: Stratotype Point Base of Floian
Comment: Diabasbrottet, Hunneberg, Sweden
See Also: http://stratigraphy.science.purdue.edu/r...
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/Floian....
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/index.h...
Source: Episodes 27/4, p. 265 272, 2004
Boundary Level: in the lower Tøyen Shale, 2.1m above the top of the Cambrian
Correlation Event: Graptolite FAD Tetragraptus approximatus
Ratified GSSP: true
Status: Ratified 2002
Shape: Base Floian-location

Furongian
Type: Stratigraphic Point
Label: Stratotype Point Base of Furongian
Comment: Wuling Mountains, Huayuan County, NW Hunan Province, China
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/Paibian...
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/index.h...
Source: Lethaia 37, p. 365 379, 2004
Boundary Level: at 396 m in the Huaqiao Formation
Correlation Event: Trilobite FAD Glyptagnostus reticulatus
Ratified GSSP: true
Status: Ratified 2003
Shape: Base Furongian-location

Givetian
Type: Stratigraphic Point
Label: Stratotype Point Base of Givetian
Comment: Jebel Mech Irdane, Morocco
See Also: http://stratigraphy.science.purdue.edu/r...
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/Givetia...
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/index.h...
Source: Episodes 18/3, p. 107 115, 1995
Boundary Level: Base of Bed 123
Correlation Event: Conodont FAD Polygnathus hemiansatus
Ratified GSSP: true
Status: Ratified 1994
Shape: Base Givetian-location

Guadalupian
Type: Stratigraphic Point
Label: Stratotype Point Base of Guadalupian
Comment: Stratotype Canyon, Texas, U.S.A
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/index.h...
Boundary Level: 42.7m above the Base of the Cutoff Formation
Correlation Event: Conodont FAD Jinogondolella nankingensis
Ratified GSSP: true
Status: Ratified 2001
Shape: Base Guadalupian-location

Guzhangian
Type: Stratigraphic Point
Label: Stratotype Point Base of Guzhangian
Comment: Louyixi, Guzhang County, NW Hunan Province, S. China
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/Guzhang...
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/index.h...
Source: Episodes 32/1, p.41-55, 2009
Boundary Level: 121.3 m above the Base of the Huaqiao Formation
Correlation Event: Trilobite FAD Lejopyge Laevigata
Ratified GSSP: true
Status: Ratified 2008
Shape: Base Guzhangian-location

Hirnantian
Type: Stratigraphic Point
Label: Stratotype Point Base of Hirnantian
Comment: Wangjiawan North section, N of Yichang city, Western Hubei Province, China
See Also: http://stratigraphy.science.purdue.edu/r...
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/Hirnant...
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/index.h...
Source: Episodes 29/3, p. 183 196, 2006
Boundary Level: 0.39m below the Base of the Kuanyinchiao Bed
Correlation Event: Graptolite FAD Normalograptus extraordinarius
Ratified GSSP: true
Status: Ratified 2006
Shape: Base Hirnantian-location

Holocene
Type: Stratigraphic Point
Label: Stratotype Point Base of Holocene
Comment: NorthGRIP ice core, central Greenland
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/Holocen...
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/index.h...
See Also: http://stratigraphy.science.purdue.edu/r...
Source: Episodes 31/2, 2008
Source: J. Quaternary Sci., Vol. 24 pp. 3–17, 2009
Boundary Level: 1492.45m depth in Borehole NGRIP2
Correlation Event: Climatic -- End of the Younger Dryas cold ellSP, which is reflected in a shift in deuterium excess values
Ratified GSSP: true
Status: Ratified 2008
Shape: Base Holocene-location

Homerian
Type: Stratigraphic Point
Label: Stratotype Point Base of Homerian
Comment: Sheinton Brook, Homer, UK
See Also: http://stratigraphy.science.purdue.edu/r...
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/Sheinwo...
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/index.h...
Source: Episodes 5/3, p. 21 23, 1982
Source: Geol. Series, Nat. Mus. Wales, 9, p. 51 73, 1989
Source: Lethaia 14
Boundary Level: within upper part of the Apedale Member of the Coalbrookdale Formation
Correlation Event: Graptolite FAD Cyrtograptus lundgreni
Ratified GSSP: true
Status: Ratified 1980
Shape: Base Homerian-location

Jiangshanian
Type: Stratigraphic Point
Label: Stratotype Point Base of Jiangshanian
Comment: Duibian B section, Zhejiang province, China
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/Jiangsh...
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/index.h...
Source: Episodes 35/4, p.462-477, 2012
Boundary Level: 28.2 m in Duibian B section
Correlation Event: FAD of agnostid trilobite Agnostotes orientalis and the FO of polymerid trilobite Irvingella angustilimbata
Ratified GSSP: true
Status: Ratified 2011
Shape: Base Jiangshanian Location

Jurassic
Type: Stratigraphic Point
Label: Stratotype Point Base of Jurassic
Comment: Kuhjoch section,Tyrol, Austria
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/Hettang...
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/index.h...
Source: Episodes 36/3, p. 162-198, 2013
Boundary Level: 5.80 m above top of Koessen Formation
Correlation Event: FO of ammonite Psiloceras elaeSP tirolicum, FO of aragonitic foraminifer Praegubkinella turgescens
Ratified GSSP: true
Status: Ratified 2010
Shape: Base Jurassic-location

Katian
Type: Stratigraphic Point
Label: Stratotype Point Base of Katian
Comment: Black Knob Ridge Section, Atoka, Oklahoma (USA)
See Also: http://www.episodes.org/backissues/304/3...
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/Katian....
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/index.h...
Source: Episodes 30/4, p.258 270, 2007
Boundary Level: 4.0m above the Base of the Bigfork Chert
Correlation Event: Graptolite FAD Diplacanthograptus caudatus
Ratified GSSP: true
Status: Ratified 2006
Shape: Base Katian-location

Ladinian
Type: Stratigraphic Point
Label: Stratotype Point Base of Ladinian
Comment: Bagolino, Province of Brescia, Northern Italy
See Also: http://stratigraphy.science.purdue.edu/r...
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/index.h...
Source: Episodes 28/4, p. 233 244, 2005
Boundary Level: Base of a 15 20cm thick limestone bed overlying a distinctive groove (Chiesense groove) ; of limestone nodules in a shaly matrix, located about 5m above the Base of the Buchenstein Beds
Correlation Event: Ammonite FAD Eoprotrachyceras curionii (Base of the E. curionii zone) ;. Conodont FAD Budurovignathus praehungaricus is in the uppermost Anisian.
Ratified GSSP: true
Status: Ratified 2005
Shape: Base Ladinian-location

Lopingian
Type: Stratigraphic Point
Label: Stratotype Point Base of Lopingian
Comment: Penglaitan, Guanxi Province, South China
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/Wuchiap...
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/index.h...
Source: Episodes 29/4, p. 253 262, 2006
Boundary Level: Base of Bed 6k in the Penglaitan Section
Correlation Event: Conodont FAD Clarkina postbitteri postbitteri
Ratified GSSP: true
Status: Ratified 2004
Shape: Base Lopingian-location

Ludfordian
Type: Stratigraphic Point
Label: Stratotype Point Base of Ludfordian
Comment: near Ludlow, UK
See Also: http://stratigraphy.science.purdue.edu/r...
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/Sheinwo...
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/index.h...
Source: Episodes 5/3, p. 2123, 1982
Source: Geol. Series, Nat. Mus. Wales, 9, p. 73 90, 1989
Source: Lethaia 14
Boundary Level: coincident with the Base of the Leintwardine Formation
Correlation Event: Imprecise. May be near Base of Saetograptus leintwardinensis Graptolite zone.
Ratified GSSP: true
Status: Ratified 1980
Shape: Base Ludfordian-location

Ludlow
Type: Stratigraphic Point
Label: Stratotype Point Base of Ludlow
Comment: near Ludlow, UK
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/Sheinwo...
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/index.h...
Source: Episodes 5/3, p. 21-23, 1982
Source: Geol. Series, Nat. Mus. Wales, 9, p. 73 90, 1989
Source: Lethaia 14
Boundary Level: coincident with the Base of the Lower Elton Formation
Correlation Event: near Ludlow, UK | coincident with the Base of the Lower Elton Formation |Graptolite FAD Saetograptus (Colonograptus) ; varians
Ratified GSSP: true
Status: Ratified 1980
Shape: Base Ludlow-location

Lutetian
Type: Stratigraphic Point
Label: Stratotype Point Base of Lutetian
Comment: Gorrondatxe section, Basque Country, ainSP
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/Lutetia...
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/index.h...
Source: Episodes 34/2, p.86 - 108, 2011
Boundary Level: dark marl at 167.85 m in Gorrondatxe sea-cliff section
Correlation Event: LO of calcareous nannofossil Blackites inflatus (CP12a/b boundary) ;; middle of polarity Chron C21r
Ratified GSSP: true
Status: Ratified 2011
Shape: Base Lutetian-location

Maastrichtian
Type: Stratigraphic Point
Label: Stratotype Point Base of Maastrichtian
Comment: Tercis les Bains, Landes, France
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/Maastri...
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/index.h...
Source: Episodes 24/4, p. 229 238, 2001
Boundary Level: level 115.2 on platform IV of the geological site at Tercis les Bains
Correlation Event: Mean of 12 biostratigraphic criteria of equal importance. Closely above is FAD of ammonite Pachydiscus neubergicus. Boreal proxy is FAD of belemnite Belemnella lanceolata.
Ratified GSSP: true
Status: Ratified 2001
Shape: Base Maastrichtian-location

Mesozoic
Type: Stratigraphic Point
Label: Stratotype Point Base of Mesozoic
Comment: Meishan, Zhejiang Province, China
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/Induan....
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/index.h...
Source: Episodes 24/2, p. 102 114, 2001
Boundary Level: Base of Bed 27c in the Meishan D Section
Correlation Event: Conodont FAD Hindeodus parvus
Ratified GSSP: true
Status: Ratified 2001
Shape: Base Mesozoic-location

Messinian
Type: Stratigraphic Point
Label: Stratotype Point Base of Messinian
Comment: Oued Akrech, Morocco
See Also: http://stratigraphy.science.purdue.edu/r...
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/Messini...
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/index.h...
Source: Episodes 23/3, p. 172 178, 2000
Boundary Level: reddish layer of sedimentary cycle number 15
Correlation Event: Planktonic foraminifer first regular occurrence of Globorotalia miotumida, and calcareous nannofossil FAD Amaurolithus delicatus
Ratified GSSP: true
Status: Ratified 2000
Shape: Base Messinian-location

Middle Devonian
Type: Stratigraphic Point
Label: Stratotype Point Base of Middle Devonian
Comment: Wetteldorf, Eifel Hills, Germany
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/Eifelia...
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/index.h...
Source: Episodes 8/2, p. 104 109, 1985
Boundary Level: 21.25m above the Base of the exposed section, Base of sample station WP30
Correlation Event: Conodont FAD Polygnathus costatus partitus
Ratified GSSP: true
Status: Ratified 1985
Shape: Base Middle Devonian-location

Middle Jurassic
Type: Stratigraphic Point
Label: Stratotype Point Base of Middle Jurassic
Comment: Fuentelsaz, ainSP
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/Aalenia...
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/index.h...
Source: Episodes 24/3, p.166 175, 2001
Boundary Level: Base of Bed FZ 107
Correlation Event: Ammonite FAD Leioceras opalinum and Leioceras lineatum
Ratified GSSP: true
Status: Ratified 2000
Shape: Base Middle Jurassic-location

Middle Mississippian
Type: Stratigraphic Point
Label: Stratotype Point Base of Middle Mississippian
Comment: Pengchong, south China
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/Visean....
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/index.h...
Source: Episodes 26/2, p. 105 –115, 2003
Boundary Level: Base of bed 83 in the Pengchong Section
Correlation Event: Benthic Foraminifer FAD Eoparastaffella simplex
Ratified GSSP: true
Status: Ratified 2008
Shape: Base Middle Mississippian-location

Middle Ordovician
Type: Stratigraphic Point
Label: Stratotype Point Base of Middle Ordovician
Comment: Huanghuachang Section, NE of Yichang city, Hubei Province, S. China
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/Dapingi...
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/Dapingi...
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/index.h...
Source: Episodes 28/2, p. 105 117, 2005
Source: Episodes 32/2, p. 96 113, 2009
Boundary Level: 10.57 m above Base of the Dawan Formation
Correlation Event: Conodont FAD of Baltoniodus triangularis
Ratified GSSP: true
Status: Ratified 2007
Shape: Base Middle Ordovician-location

Neogene
Type: Stratigraphic Point
Label: Stratotype Point Base of Neogene
Comment: Lemme Carrioso Section, Allessandria Province, Italy
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/Aquitan...
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/index.h...
Source: Episodes 20/1, p. 23 28, 1997
Boundary Level: 35m from the top of the section
Correlation Event: Magnetic Base of Chron C6Cn.2n planktonic foraminifer FAD of Paragloborotalia kugleri calcareous nannofossil near LAD Reticulofenestra bisecta (Base of Zone NN1) ; Oxygen isotopic event Mi 1.
Ratified GSSP: true
Status: Ratified 1996
Shape: Base Neogene-location

Oligocene
Type: Stratigraphic Point
Label: Stratotype Point Base of Oligocene
Comment: Massignano, near Ancona, Italy
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/Rupelia...
See Also: http://www.stratigraphy.org/GSSP/index.h...

The current Stratotype Point does not coincide with the Base of the Cyrtograptus centrifugus Biozone, as was supposed when the Stratotype Point was defined. Restudy recommends a slightly higher and correlatable level on condonts the Ireviken datum 2, which coincides approximately with the Base of the murchisoni Graptolite Biozone
